entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [RSG] Avoid declaration generation code for cshtml files #35744
    6.0-rc2
  • Create an analyzer that warns when a parameter on a route handler delegate has a BindAsync method that doesn't comply with RequestDelegateFactory requirements #35733
  • ClientTimesoutWhenHandshakeResponseTakesTooLong test failure #35728
  • Create an analyzer that warns when delegates are mapped to GET, DELETE, or HEAD requests and expect a request body #35727
  • Add & publish a cm.1 file for each .rpm we ship #35725
    6.0-rc2
  • Startup regression: single_query #35723
  • Be smarter about providing fully qualified Component completion items #35716
    17.0-Preview4
  • Big-endian platforms not supported #35709
  • Remove reference to PhysicalFileProvider from WebViewManager to fix iOS App Store publishing #35707
  • Responsive flex layout is not working in Blazor Virtualize #35700
    Backlog
  • HTTP/3: Investigate flakey interop tests #35699
    6.0.0
  • Exception OnParametersSetAsync with CascadingParameter #35696
  • Startup regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #35695
  • API Review: WithTags, ITagsMetadata, TagsAttribute #35693
  • Migrate VSCode semantic tokens to official API #35692
    Razor.Tooling
  • Test Failure: `ConnectionClosedTokenFiresOnServerAbort` #35686
    Backlog
  • Test failure: `StatusCode204StopsLongPollingTriggersOnClosed` #35684
  • Minimal APIs doesn't describe it's implicit 400 and 415 response behaviors to ApiExplorer #35683

Closed

  • Guid/String type convert error when extend IdentityUser<Guid> #35374
    Backlog
  • hotreload breaks blazor webassembly with asp and user defined base path - missing blazor-hotreload.js returns 404 #35555
    6.0-rc2
  • Specific component for dealing with large amounts of text data (InputTextArea) #30291
    6.0-rc2
  • Razor Comment Colorization doesn't colorize all lines #27447
    17.0-Preview4
  • Keyboard input doesn't work for InputDateType.DateTimeLocal #35498
    6.0-rc2
  • Add analyzer to check for closing over loop variable #10476
    Backlog
  • `Components.E2ETests.ServerTransportsTest`s Failing (not quarantined) #35481
    6.0-rc2
  • Startup improvement: fortunes_ef #35667
  • Startup improvement: updates #35724
  • SVG <animate> element does not animate when the "begin" attribute begins immediately (value of "0s"). #35697
  • QUESTION: How to configure ASP.net Core to work with kubernetes NGINX ingress #35660
  • Slow File download speed using HTTP.sys #35612
  • .Net 6 p7 Wasm publised throws Blazor detected a change in the application's culture that is not supported with the current project configuration #35550
    6.0-rc2
  • SPA templates bootstrap 5 update #35702
  • Startup regression: fortunes_ef #35666
  • Change applied to Blazor WebAssembly app using .NET Hot Reload don't show up after adding binding code #34446
    6.0-rc2
  • VSCode - Razor extension crashes when directory contains plus sign #33144
    17.0-Preview4
  • Blazor wasm: Uncaught (in promise) Error: System.InvalidOperationException: There was an error parsing the event arguments. EventId: '13'. #35348

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Fix keyboard input for 'time' and 'datetime-local' inputs #35742
    area-blazor
  • [Blazor] Backport API persistence feedback changes #35738
    area-blazor
  • Complain if a route parameter is not used or cannot be bound. #35732
    area-infrastructure
  • Quarantine SignalR test #35730
    area-signalr
  • [SPA] Update spa templates submodule #35720
    area-mvc
  • Use ArrayPool as default pool fallback #35719
    area-runtime
  • Big-endian fixes: Guid handling in KeyRingBasedDataProtector.cs #35715
    area-dataprotection, community-contribution
  • Big-endian fixes: binary data in RenderBatch #35714
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Big-endian fixes: Kestrel IP/socket address handling #35713
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Big-endian fixes: Kestrel string processing #35711
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Update timeouts in Java tests #35687
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java

Merged

  • Update .NET SDK to `6.0.100-rc.2.21424.34` #35691
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Always download blazor-hotreload.js from app root #35737
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Call next middleware correctly for rewrite with skip #35708
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Fix keyboard input for 'time' and 'datetime-local' inputs #35682
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0] Complain when returning IActionResult from MinimalAction #35710
    area-infrastructure, 6.0-rc2
  • Move IResultsExtension to M.A.Http namespace #35717
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, area-web-frameworks, 6.0-rc1
  • Backport `Release object URL after image for resize has loaded (#35499)` to 6.0 #35712
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Fix 'HeadOutlet' getting trimmed away for Blazor WebAssembly prerendered apps after publish #35671
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0-rc1] [SPA] Ensure spawned NPM processes are terminated when the dotnet process is ungracefully terminated #35701
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Fix key comparison for more than 10 elements in AdaptiveCapacityDictionary #35705
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • Release object URL after image for resize has loaded #35499
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Don't cache CanReuse value #35676
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0-rc1
  • [release/6.0] Avoid using new C# language features in Razor code generation #35703
    area-mvc, 6.0-rc2
  • [release/6.0] Update HotReloadAgent to SDK https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet… #35704
    area-blazor, 6.0-rc2
  • Fix key comparison for more than 10 elements in AdaptiveCapacityDictionary #35685
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview1
  • Quarantine two tests #35690
    7.0-preview1
  • Update HotReloadAgent to SDK https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet… #35673
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Avoid using new C# language features in Razor code generation #35680
    area-mvc, 7.0-preview1
  • Workaround dotnet/core-eng#14186 #35688
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0-rc1' => 'release/6.0' #35674
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 6.0-rc2

Updated

  • [release/6.0] HTTP/3: Skip client certificate tests on non-Windows #35804
    area-runtime
  • HTTP/3: Skip client certificate tests on non-Windows #35803
    area-runtime
  • Add analyzer for detecting misplaced attributes on delegates #35779
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add ParameterInfo argument to BindAsync and return specific type instead of object #35795
    area-web-frameworks
  • Add ParameterInfo argument to BindAsync and return specific type instead of object #35791
    area-web-frameworks
  • Stop Serializing `InvokeVoidAsync` Return Value #35799
  • Startup analyzers work for minimal apps #35747
    area-web-frameworks
  • [release/6.0-rc1] Add API parameter description to API description to represent the request body - 35421 #35798
    area-web-frameworks
  • [SPA] Add tests to ensure we don't break the SPA templates when making template changes #35783
    area-mvc
  • [Blazor] Applies API review feedback and removes byte array APIs from the public API surface #35768
    area-blazor
  • Use Span for deserializing #35286
    area-runtime, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • [Blazor] Apply persistence api review feedback #31147
    area-blazor
  • [release/6.0] Added coverage for developer exception page #35786
    area-runtime, tell-mode
  • Add support for WithTags extension method #35672
    feature-minimal-actions, area-web-frameworks
  • Support generic array parameters in components #34734
    area-mvc, community-contribution, area-razor.compiler
  • HTTP/3: Server cancellation and abort exceptions consistency #35764
    area-runtime
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `dc078f5` to `7c21773` #35756
    area-infrastructure
  • Update templates to use scoped CSS #35658
    area-mvc
  • Identity UI Bootstrap 5.1 tweaks #35467
    area-identity
  • Update RazorPage template to be able to be SxS with previous version #34598
    area-mvc
  • Include source in RequestDelegateFactory missing required parameter log #35580
    area-runtime
